articles.content:
The ASX is set to rebound on Thursday after a shaky week, as the Dow Jones hit a new record high in the US overnight.
At 7:15am AEDT, ASX 200 futures were up 0.6 per cent, to 6,751.
The market clos… [+4539 chars]

articles.author: Good Food team
articles.title: Pioneering restaurateur Amy Chanta of Chat Thai restaurants dies - Good Food
articles.description: Amy Chanta, who popularised Thai flavours with Sydney diners and launched a chain of restaurants, has died.
articles.content:
The pioneering restaurateur behind the popular Chat Thai restaurants across Sydney, Amy Chanta, has died.
Chanta lived with cancer for two years before passing away yesterday, her daughter, fellow r… [+2764 chars]

articles.description: Customers told to enact DR plans.
